entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks.EntityFrameworkCore NuGet version 7.0.x does not support NET 6.0.x, but the EntityFrameworkCore 7.0.x does support NET 6.0.x. #29903
  • Renaming `PeriodStart` and `PeriodEnd` columns of a temporal table causes them to be swapped #29902
  • Howto update auto-implemented (by convention) many to many in Entity Framework Core 6 (.Net 6)? #29901
  • DBNull shows up as a large negative value -9223372036854774807 automatically triggering DBConcurrencyException for Concurrency tokens #29900
  • TPC and TPH mapping strategies not respecting default database schema during migration #29899

Closed

  • Error with loading the Spatialite extension with v7 of sqlite provider #29833
  • The convention invocations have reached the recursion limit #29790
  • Use HTTPS URL for 1-to-1 foreign key exception #29895
    8.0.0
  • Alpine 3.17 for mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/aspnet:3.1 docker image #29886

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix HTTP links in messages to use HTTPS #29896
  • Update discriminator columns when PK-to-PK dependent type is changed #29876

Updated

  • Identity resolution for loading detached entities #29884
